author: mturk
msg: New procrun binaries with 'auto' stderr/stdout log files.

author: mturk
msg: Added custom 'retries' for worker, so we don't depend on
default setting. If set to a number grater then 3, it will sleep
for 100ms on retry greater then 3 and then try again.

author: mturk
msg: TODO: we should make the number of retries configurable.

author: mturk
msg: Use new trace macros and native types where possible.
